title: Web Components Configuration
description: Defines a list of web components that can be auto-detected by the remark plugin.

components.title: Web Components List
components.description: List of web components available for detection and conditional import.

slug.description: Unique tag slug for the web component (used as <slug> in HTML).

import.description: ESM import path for the web component (e.g., '@/components/MyComponent.astro').

enabled.description: Whether the web component should be detected (default: true).

description.description: Optional human-readable description of the web component.
